headline: Research reveals how Delta and other airlines use AI to set ticket prices
summary: In its latest earnings call, Delta said it’s been ‘testing’ AI pricing. A new white paper from its software partner, Fetcherr, explains what goes into the algorithm.

raw.headline: Research reveals how Delta and other airlines use AI to set ticket prices

headline: IYT: A Concentrated Approach To The Transportation Industry
summary: Invest in IYT for exposure to top performers like Uber & Union Pacific. Outpacing peers, it leverages economic growth & tech innovation in transport.
